statements.statement: SELECT sub.[SubjectNo] , sub.[SubjectName] , sub.[TitlePic1] , sub.[TitlePic2] , sub.[DateBegin] , sub.[DateEnd] , sub.[BelongsSubjectPic] , sub.[VisitCount] , sub.[DiscountType] , sub.[DiscountTypeValue] , sub.[ContentIntorType] , sub.[ContentRecommended] , sub.[ContentRecommType] , sub.[SubjectTemplate] , sub.[FlapPic] , sub.[Gender] , sub.[DateCreate] , sub.[Status] , sub.[IPhonePic] , sub.BrandContent , sub.BU, b.BrandNo AS BrandSign, e.BrandLogo , b.BrandCnName , b.BrandEnName , sub.[SalesForecast] FROM [SWfsSubject] (NOLOCK) AS sub LEFT OUTER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) AS B ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(200), sub.BrandContent) = b.BrandNo inner join SpBrandExtend (nolock) as e on e.BrandNo = B.BrandNo #if($ChannelSord !='') inner join SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef on sub.SubjectNo=SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SubjectNo #end where sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.SubjectTemplate !=5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 and sub.IsAudited=1 and DATEDIFF(day,@StartDate, sub.DateBegin)=0 AND sub.DateEnd > getdate() #if($ChannelSord !='') and SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SordNo=@ChannelSord #end #if($SubjectNameNo !='') and (sub.SubjectName like '%'+@SubjectNameNo+ '%' or sub.SubjectNo like '%'+@SubjectNameNo+ '%') #end #if($BU!='') and sub.BU=@BU #end #if($BrandNo !='') and B.BrandNo=@BrandNo #end ORDER BY sub.DateBegin DESC ,sub.DateCreate DESC

SELECT sub.[SubjectNo] , sub.[SubjectName] , sub.[TitlePic1] , sub.[TitlePic2] , sub.[DateBegin] , sub.[DateEnd] , sub.[BelongsSubjectPic] , sub.[VisitCount] , sub.[DiscountType] , sub.[DiscountTypeValue] , sub.[ContentIntorType] , sub.[ContentRecommended] , sub.[ContentRecommType] , sub.[SubjectTemplate] , sub.[FlapPic] , sub.[Gender] , sub.[DateCreate] , sub.[Status] , sub.[IPhonePic] , sub.BrandContent , sub.BU, b.BrandNo AS BrandSign, e.BrandLogo , b.BrandCnName , b.BrandEnName , sub.[SalesForecast] FROM [SWfsSubject] (NOLOCK) AS sub LEFT OUTER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) AS B ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(200), sub.BrandContent) = b.BrandNo inner join SpBrandExtend (nolock) as e on e.BrandNo = B.BrandNo #if($ChannelSord !='') inner join SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef on sub.SubjectNo=SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SubjectNo #end where sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.SubjectTemplate !=5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 AND sub.IsAudited=1 AND sub.DateBegin < @StartDate AND sub.DateEnd > @EndDate #if($ChannelSord !='') and SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SordNo=@ChannelSord #end #if($SubjectNameNo !='') and (sub.SubjectName like '%'+@SubjectNameNo+ '%' or sub.SubjectNo like '%'+@SubjectNameNo+ '%') #end #if($BU!='') and sub.BU=@BU #end #if($BrandNo !='') and B.BrandNo=@BrandNo #end #if($QueryStartTime!='') and CONVERT(varchar(50),sub.DateBegin,23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50),@QueryStartTime,23) #end #if($QueryEndTime!='') AND CONVERT(varchar(50),sub.DateBegin,23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50),@QueryEndTime,23) #end

select SubjectName,SWfsSubject.SubjectNo,DateBegin,DateEnd,SWfsSubject.[Status],DateCreate,ChannelNo,BelongsSubjectPic,SubjectTemplate,TitlePic1,BU,SalesForecast,ISNULL([Level],0) AS [Level],ISNULL(PromotionApplyTime,'1900-01-01 00:00:00') AS PromotionApplyTime,ISNULL(PromotionConfirmTime,'1900-01-01 00:00:00') AS PromotionConfirmTime,IsAudited,ISNULL(b.BrandNo,'') AS BrandSign ,ISNULL(b.BrandCnName,'') AS BrandCnName,ISNULL(b.BrandEnName,'') as BrandEnName,IsPreheat,ISNULL(tope.PreheatTime, '1900-01-01 00:00:00') AS PreheatTime from SWfsSubject with (NoLock) LEFT OUTER JOIN SWfsSubjectApplyPromotion(NoLock) ON dbo.SWfsSubject.SubjectNo = dbo.SWfsSubjectApplyPromotion.SubjectNo LEFT OUTER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) AS b ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(200), SWfsSubject.BrandContent) = b.BrandNo LEFT OUTER JOIN SWfsSubjectTopExpand (NOLOCK) AS tope ON dbo.SWfsSubject.SubjectNo = tope.SubjectNo #if($ChannelSord !='') inner join SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef on SWfsSubject.SubjectNo=SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SubjectNo where SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SordNo=@ChannelSord and SWfsSubject.Status!=3 #end #if($ChannelSord =='') where SWfsSubject.Status!=3 #end #if($SubjectNoArray !='') AND SWfsSubject.SubjectNo IN @SubjectNoArray #end #if($KeyWord !='') and (SWfsSubject.SubjectName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or SWfsSubject.SubjectNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($ProductNo!='') and SWfsSubject.SubjectNo IN(SELECT sc.SubjectNo FROM dbo.SWfsSubjectProductRef AS spref , dbo.SWfsSubjectCategory AS sc WHERE spref.CategoryNo=sc.CategoryNo AND spref.ProductNo=@ProductNo AND spref.TypeFlag=0) #end #if($Status!='') and SWfsSubject.[Status] =@Status #end #if($StartTime!='') and CONVERT(varchar(50),SWfsSubject.DateBegin,23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50),@StartTime,23) #end #if($EndTime!='') AND CONVERT(varchar(50),SWfsSubject.DateBegin,23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50),@EndTime,23) #end #if($ChannelNo!='') and SWfsSubject.ChannelNo like '%'+@ChannelNo+ '%' #end #if($SubjectTemplate!='') and SWfsSubject.SubjectTemplate=@SubjectTemplate #end #if($BU!='') and SWfsSubject.BU=@BU #end #if($IsAudited!='') and SWfsSubject.IsAudited=@IsAudited #end #if($BrandNo!='') and b.BrandNo=@BrandNo #end #if($RunStatus==1) and SWfsSubject.IsPreheat=1 and SWfsSubject.DateBegin > getdate() #elseif($RunStatus==2) and (SWfsSubject.DateBegin <= getdate() or (SWfsSubject.DateBegin > getdate() and SWfsSubject.IsPreheat=0)) and SWfsSubject.DateEnd > getdate() #elseif($RunStatus==3) and SWfsSubject.DateEnd < getdate() #end

select SubjectName,SWfsSubject.SubjectNo,DateBegin,DateEnd,SWfsSubject.[Status],DateCreate,ChannelNo,BelongsSubjectPic,SubjectTemplate,TitlePic1,BU,SalesForecast,ISNULL([Level],0) AS [Level],ISNULL(PromotionApplyTime,'1900-01-01 00:00:00') AS PromotionApplyTime,ISNULL(PromotionConfirmTime,'1900-01-01 00:00:00') AS PromotionConfirmTime,IsAudited,ISNULL(b.BrandNo,'') AS BrandSign ,ISNULL(b.BrandCnName,'') AS BrandCnName,ISNULL(b.BrandEnName,'') as BrandEnName,IsPreheat,ISNULL(tope.PreheatTime, '1900-01-01 00:00:00') AS PreheatTime,ISNULL(IsChecked, 0) AS IsChecked from SWfsSubject with (NoLock) LEFT OUTER JOIN SWfsSubjectApplyPromotion(NoLock) ON dbo.SWfsSubject.SubjectNo = dbo.SWfsSubjectApplyPromotion.SubjectNo LEFT OUTER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) AS b ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(200), SWfsSubject.BrandContent) = b.BrandNo LEFT OUTER JOIN SWfsSubjectTopExpand (NOLOCK) AS tope ON dbo.SWfsSubject.SubjectNo = tope.SubjectNo #if($ChannelSord !='') inner join SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef on SWfsSubject.SubjectNo=SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SubjectNo where SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SordNo=@ChannelSord and SWfsSubject.IsPreheat=1 and SWfsSubject.Status!=3 #end #if($ChannelSord =='') where SWfsSubject.Status!=3 and SWfsSubject.IsPreheat=1 #end #if($KeyWord !='') and (SWfsSubject.SubjectName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or SWfsSubject.SubjectNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($ProductNo!='') and SWfsSubject.SubjectNo IN(SELECT sc.SubjectNo FROM dbo.SWfsSubjectProductRef AS spref , dbo.SWfsSubjectCategory AS sc WHERE spref.CategoryNo=sc.CategoryNo AND spref.ProductNo=@ProductNo AND spref.TypeFlag=0) #end #if($Status!='') and SWfsSubject.[Status] = @Status #end #if($StartTime!='') and CONVERT(varchar(50),SWfsSubject.DateBegin,23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50),@StartTime,23) #end #if($EndTime!='') AND CONVERT(varchar(50),SWfsSubject.DateBegin,23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50),@EndTime,23) #end #if($ChannelNo!='') and SWfsSubject.ChannelNo like '%'+@ChannelNo+ '%' #end #if($SubjectTemplate!='') and SWfsSubject.SubjectTemplate=@SubjectTemplate #end #if($BU!='') and SWfsSubject.BU=@BU #end #if($IsAudited!='') and SWfsSubject.IsAudited=@IsAudited #end #if($BrandNo!='') and b.BrandNo=@BrandNo #end #if($RunStatus==1) and ISNULL(IsChecked, 0) = 0 #elseif($RunStatus==2) and ISNULL(IsChecked, 0) = 1 #end

SELECT sub.SubjectNo , sub.SubjectName , ( CASE WHEN sub.[SubjectTemplate] = 4 THEN sub.[TitlePic1] ELSE sub.[BelongsSubjectPic] END ) AS BelongsSubjectPic , sub.BU , sub.DateBegin , sub.DateEnd , sub.IsPreheat , sub.BrandContent , SpBrand.BrandCnName , SpBrand.BrandEnName , ISNULL(tope.PreheatTime, '1900-01-01 00:00:00') AS PreheatTime , IsAudited FROM dbo.SWfsSubject (NOLOCK) AS sub INNER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), sub.BrandContent) = SpBrand.BrandNo LEFT OUTER JOIN SWfsSubjectTopExpand (NOLOCK) AS tope ON sub.SubjectNo = tope.SubjectNo #if($ChannelSord !='') inner join SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef (NOLOCK) on sub.SubjectNo = SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SubjectNo #end WHERE sub.SubjectTemplate != 5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.SubjectType = 0 AND sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 AND sub.IsAudited = 1 AND sub.IsPreheat = 1 #if($KeyWord !='') AND (sub.SubjectName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or sub.SubjectNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($BrandNo!='') AND SpBrand.BrandNo = @BrandNo #end #if($ChannelSord !='') AND SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SordNo = @ChannelSord #end #if($BU!='') AND sub.BU = @BU #end #if($StartTime!='') and CONVERT(varchar(50),sub.DateBegin,23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50),@StartTime,23) #end #if($EndTime!='') AND CONVERT(varchar(50),sub.DateBegin,23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50),@EndTime,23) #end AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), sub.DateBegin, 23) > CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), GETDATE(), 23) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), sub.DateEnd, 23) > CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), GETDATE(), 23)

SELECT sub.SubjectNo , sub.SubjectName , ( CASE WHEN sub.[SubjectTemplate] = 4 THEN sub.[TitlePic1] ELSE sub.[BelongsSubjectPic] END ) AS BelongsSubjectPic , sub.BU , sub.DateBegin , sub.DateEnd , sub.IsPreheat , sub.BrandContent , sub.SalesForecast, SpBrand.BrandCnName , SpBrand.BrandEnName , ISNULL(ap.PromotionApplyTime, '1900-01-01 00:00:00') AS PromotionApplyTime , ISNULL(ap.PromotionConfirmTime, '1900-01-01 00:00:00') AS PromotionConfirmTime , IsAudited , ISNULL(ap.IsChecked, '0') AS IsChecked FROM dbo.SWfsSubject (NOLOCK) AS sub INNER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), sub.BrandContent) = SpBrand.BrandNo LEFT OUTER JOIN SWfsSubjectApplyPromotion (NOLOCK) AS ap ON sub.SubjectNo = ap.SubjectNo #if($ChannelSord !='') inner join SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef (NOLOCK) on sub.SubjectNo = SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SubjectNo #end WHERE sub.SubjectTemplate != 5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.SubjectType = 0 AND sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 AND sub.IsAudited = 1 AND ap.IsChecked = 1 #if($KeyWord !='') AND (sub.SubjectName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or sub.SubjectNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($BrandNo!='') AND SpBrand.BrandNo = @BrandNo #end #if($ChannelSord !='') AND SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SordNo = @ChannelSord #end #if($BU!='') AND sub.BU = @BU #end #if($ConfirmStartTime!='') AND CONVERT(varchar(50),ap.PromotionConfirmTime,23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50),@ConfirmStartTime,23) #end #if($ConfirmEndTime!='') AND CONVERT(varchar(50),ap.PromotionConfirmTime,23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50),@ConfirmEndTime,23) #end AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), sub.DateBegin, 23) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), GETDATE(), 23) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), sub.DateEnd, 23) > CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), GETDATE(), 23)

SELECT sub.SubjectNo , sub.SubjectName , ( CASE WHEN sub.[SubjectTemplate] = 4 THEN sub.[TitlePic1] ELSE sub.[BelongsSubjectPic] END ) AS BelongsSubjectPic , sub.BU , sub.DateBegin , sub.DateEnd , sub.IsPreheat , sub.BrandContent , sub.SalesForecast , SpBrand.BrandCnName , SpBrand.BrandEnName FROM dbo.SWfsSubject (NOLOCK) AS sub INNER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), sub.BrandContent) = SpBrand.BrandNo #if($ChannelSord !='') inner join SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef (NOLOCK) on sub.SubjectNo = SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SubjectNo #end WHERE sub.SubjectTemplate != 5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.SubjectType = 0 AND sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 AND sub.IsAudited = 1 AND sub.DateEnd < GETDATE() #if($KeyWord !='') AND (sub.SubjectName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or sub.SubjectNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($BrandNo!='') AND SpBrand.BrandNo = @BrandNo #end #if($ChannelSord !='') AND SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SordNo = @ChannelSord #end #if($BU!='') AND sub.BU = @BU #end

SELECT sub.SubjectNo FROM [SWfsSubject] (NOLOCK) AS sub LEFT OUTER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) AS B ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(200), sub.BrandContent) = b.BrandNo WHERE sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.SubjectTemplate != 5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 AND sub.IsAudited = 1 AND DATEDIFF(day, GETDATE(), sub.DateBegin) = 0 AND sub.DateEnd > GETDATE()

SELECT COUNT(1) AS runCount FROM [SWfsSubject] (NOLOCK) AS sub LEFT OUTER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) AS B ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(200), sub.BrandContent) = b.BrandNo WHERE sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.SubjectTemplate != 5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 AND sub.IsAudited = 1 AND sub.DateBegin < CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), GETDATE(), 23) AND sub.DateEnd > DATEADD(day, 1, GETDATE())

SELECT COUNT(1) AS inCount FROM dbo.SWfsSubject (NOLOCK) AS sub INNER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), sub.BrandContent) = SpBrand.BrandNo LEFT OUTER JOIN SWfsSubjectTopExpand (NOLOCK) AS tope ON sub.SubjectNo = tope.SubjectNo WHERE sub.SubjectTemplate != 5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.SubjectType = 0 AND sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 AND sub.IsAudited = 1 AND sub.IsPreheat = 1 AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), sub.DateBegin, 23) > CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), GETDATE(), 23) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), sub.DateEnd, 23) > CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), GETDATE(), 23)

SELECT COUNT(1) AS outCount FROM dbo.SWfsSubject (NOLOCK) AS sub INNER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), sub.BrandContent) = SpBrand.BrandNo LEFT OUTER JOIN SWfsSubjectApplyPromotion (NOLOCK) AS ap ON sub.SubjectNo = ap.SubjectNo WHERE sub.SubjectTemplate != 5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.SubjectType = 0 AND sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 AND sub.IsAudited = 1 AND ap.IsChecked = 1 AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), sub.DateBegin, 23) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), GETDATE(), 23) AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), sub.DateEnd, 23) > CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), GETDATE(), 23)

SELECT sub.SubjectNo , sub.SubjectName , ( CASE WHEN sub.[SubjectTemplate] = 4 THEN sub.[TitlePic1] ELSE sub.[BelongsSubjectPic] END ) AS BelongsSubjectPic , sub.BU , sub.DateBegin , sub.DateEnd , sub.IsPreheat , te.PreheatTime , sub.BrandContent , SpBrand.BrandCnName , SpBrand.BrandEnName FROM dbo.SWfsSubject (NOLOCK) AS sub INNER JOIN SpBrand (NOLOCK) ON CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), sub.BrandContent) = SpBrand.BrandNo LEFT OUTER JOIN SWfsSubjectTopExpand (NOLOCK) AS te ON sub.SubjectNo = te.SubjectNo #if($ChannelSord !='') inner join SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef (NOLOCK) on sub.SubjectNo = SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SubjectNo #end WHERE sub.SubjectTemplate != 5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub.SubjectType = 0 AND sub.IsRelated = 0 AND sub.[Status] = 1 AND sub.IsAudited = 1 AND ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dbo.SWfsSubject (NOLOCK) AS sub1 WHERE sub1.SubjectTemplate != 5 AND CHARINDEX('zsqd001', sub1.ChannelNo) > 0 AND sub1.SubjectType = 0 AND sub1.IsRelated = 0 AND sub1.[Status] = 1 AND sub1.IsAudited = 1 #if($StartTime=='' && $EndTime=='') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),sub1.DateBegin,23) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),GETDATE(),23) #end #if($StartTime!='') AND CONVERT(varchar(50),sub1.DateBegin,23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50),@StartTime,23) #end #if($EndTime!='') AND CONVERT(varchar(50),sub1.DateBegin,23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50),@EndTime,23) #end AND sub1.DateEnd > GETDATE() AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), sub1.BrandContent) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), sub.BrandContent) ) > 1 #if($StartTime=='' && $EndTime=='') AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),sub.DateBegin,23) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR(50),GETDATE(),23) #end #if($BrandNo!='') AND SpBrand.BrandNo=@BrandNo #end #if($ChannelSord !='') AND SWfsSubjectChannelSordRef.SordNo = @ChannelSord #end #if($StartTime!='') AND CONVERT(varchar(50),sub.DateBegin,23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50),@StartTime,23) #end #if($EndTime!='') AND CONVERT(varchar(50),sub.DateBegin,23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50),@EndTime,23) #end AND sub.DateEnd > GETDATE()
